creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
dimension: 68 3/4 × 58 in. (174.6 × 147.3 cm) (length: from neck peak to hem; width: cuff hem to cuff hem)
text: The “cosmic diagram” on the back of this robe is surrounded by six gold medallions with figures of the Eight Immortals (legendary beings), a qilin (an imaginary animal), and a bear. Interspersed among them are red symbols representing three of Daoism’s five sacred mountains.
title: Daoist priest’s robe (jiangyi)
